text: Domingo Romera Alcázar (26 May 1936 – 6 April 2022) was a Spanish politician. He was a member of the People's Alliance and later the People's Party. He was in the Senate of Spain from 1984 to 1986 and in the European Parliament from 1986 to 1994. Romera was born in Barcelona, Spain. Romera died in Lleida, Spain on 6 April 2022 at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2022 deaths Category:MEPs for Spain Category:Politicians from Barcelona
title: Domingo Romera
